# News & Events Images

This folder contains images for the News & Events section of the website.

## Required Images

Please add the following images (recommended size: 800×480px):

1. **tech-summit-2025.jpg** - African Tech Summit event
2. **new-partnership.jpg** - Partnership announcement
3. **agritech-launch.jpg** - AgriConnect platform launch
4. **team-expansion.jpg** - Team growth announcement
5. **workshop-series.jpg** - Web development workshop
6. **award-ceremony.jpg** - Best Tech Startup Award

## Image Guidelines

- **Format:** JPG or PNG
- **Size:** 800×480px (landscape orientation)
- **File size:** Under 200KB each
- **Quality:** High resolution, professional photography
- **Content:** Clear, relevant to the news item

## Placeholder Images

Until actual images are added, the section will display with a gray background placeholder.
